extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://webhelp.esri.com/arcgisdesktop/9.3/index.cfm?TopicName=About_the_ESRI_Grid_format</field><field name="filenameExtension">adf, dat, nit, stk</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: ESRI ArcInfo Grid (ESRI_grid) is a raster file format developed by ESRI to contain information about geographic space in a grid.  They are useful for representing geographic phenomena that vary continuously over space, and for performing spatial modeling and analysis of flows, trends, and surfaces such as hydrology.
name: ESRI ArcInfo Grid
